search.query: web_server=$web_server$ tag=web tag=activity | eval 4xx=if(status >= 400 AND status < 500, status, null()), 5xx=if(status >= 500, status, null()) | stats count(_raw) as hits, count(4xx) as "4xx (count)", count(5xx) as "5xx (count)", avg(response_time) as "Response Time (ms)" by site | addinfo | eval hits_per_minute=((hits)/(info_max_time - info_min_time))*60 | rename hits_per_minute as "Hits Per Minute (count)" | fields + site, "4xx (count)", "5xx (count)", "Response Time (ms)", "Hits Per Minute (count)"
